reviewText: Bought this over 5 1/2 years ago.  Who has a VHS player these days??  I don't, but this video was super helpful and way better than "Hooked on Phonics".  It truly helped our daughter to learn to read.  I don't know if this is available on DVD today, but I'll look for it because it would make a great gift for any child who is just beginning to learn to read.,
